The wilderness<S>4057</S> and the solitary place<S>6723</S> shall be glad<S>7797</S> for them; and the desert<S>6160</S> shall rejoice<S>1523</S>, and blossom<S>6524</S> as the rose<S>2261</S>.
It shall blossom<S>6524</S> abundantly<S>6524</S>, and rejoice<S>1523</S> even with joy<S>1525</S> and singing<S>7444</S>: the glory<S>3519</S> of Lebanon<S>3844</S> shall be given<S>5414</S> unto it, the excellency<S>1926</S> of Carmel<S>3760</S> and Sharon<S>8289</S>, they shall see<S>7200</S> the glory<S>3519</S> of the LORD<S>3068</S>, and the excellency<S>1926</S> of our God<S>430</S>.
Strengthen<S>2388</S> ye the weak<S>7504</S> hands<S>3027</S>, and confirm<S>553</S> the feeble<S>3782</S> knees<S>1290</S>.
Say<S>559</S> to them that are of a fearful<S>4116</S> heart<S>3820</S>, Be strong<S>2388</S>, fear<S>3372</S> not: behold, your God<S>430</S> will come<S>935</S> with vengeance<S>5359</S>, even God<S>430</S> with a recompence<S>1576</S>; he will come<S>935</S> and save<S>3467</S> you. <sup>fearful: Heb. hasty</sup>
Then the eyes<S>5869</S> of the blind<S>5787</S> shall be opened<S>6491</S>, and the ears<S>241</S> of the deaf<S>2795</S> shall be unstopped<S>6605</S>.
Then shall the lame<S>6455</S> man leap<S>1801</S> as an hart<S>354</S>, and the tongue<S>3956</S> of the dumb<S>483</S> sing<S>7442</S>: for in the wilderness<S>4057</S> shall waters<S>4325</S> break out<S>1234</S>, and streams<S>5158</S> in the desert<S>6160</S>.
And the parched ground<S>8273</S> shall become a pool<S>98</S>, and the thirsty land<S>6774</S> springs<S>4002</S> of water<S>4325</S>: in the habitation<S>5116</S> of dragons<S>8577</S>, where each lay<S>7258</S>, shall be grass<S>2682</S> with reeds<S>7070</S> and rushes<S>1573</S>. <sup>grass: or, a court for reeds, etc</sup>
And an highway<S>4547</S> shall be there, and a way<S>1870</S>, and it shall be called<S>7121</S> The way<S>1870</S> of holiness<S>6944</S>; the unclean<S>2931</S> shall not pass over<S>5674</S> it; but it shall be for those: the wayfaring men<S>1980</S>, though fools<S>191</S>, shall not err<S>8582</S> therein. <sup>but: or, for he shall be with them</sup>
No lion<S>738</S> shall be there, nor any ravenous<S>6530</S> beast<S>2416</S> shall go up<S>5927</S> thereon, it shall not be found<S>4672</S> there; but the redeemed<S>1350</S> shall walk<S>1980</S> there:
And the ransomed<S>6299</S> of the LORD<S>3068</S> shall return<S>7725</S>, and come<S>935</S> to Zion<S>6726</S> with songs<S>7440</S> and everlasting<S>5769</S> joy<S>8057</S> upon their heads<S>7218</S>: they shall obtain<S>5381</S> joy<S>8057</S> and gladness<S>8342</S>, and sorrow<S>3015</S> and sighing<S>585</S> shall flee away<S>5127</S>.
